Summary: weird object like star flew and dissapeared, then 4 planes came thru around cassiopea, not a shooting star was not fast enough
divs: Sighting DetailsIt may have been an UFO or maybe a big plane that was reflecting off the sun and then when the sun was no longer hitting it, thus looks like it dissapears. Not sure! It was white like a star and going a bit faster than a regular plane and No flashing lights like a cessna or something. It traveled a bit thru the sky then dissapears when the 4 regular airplanes were about to intersect. Two planes from left and two from right and at the intersection point the object dissapears. I find myself doubting that it was an UFO, but may have been. Not sure, I would like an explanation though. There have been other nights when i see what i think is a star until it moves around in the same general location...could be a satelite moving or something...but that was other nights. Tonight im pretty sure it was something!! There were no clouds in the sky so this object couldnt have dissapeared behind clouds.
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around November 9th 2009
